name: Flowers & Feelings 003 - Atrévete
description:
Atrévete,es una obra basada en el miedo a ser tú mismo

Muchas veces nos da miedo atrevernos a mostrarnos como realmente somos, solo por temor a ser juzgados, y no, no está bien, debemos de sentirnos siempre libre de poder mostrarnos como somos y las personas van a tener dos alternativas: Aceptarnos o irse, y definitivamente si eligen irse es lo mejor para ti.

Rodéate de personas que te hagan sentir bien, que no te juzguen y que aporten a tu vida.

-

Be brave, it is a job based on the fear of being yourself

Many times we are afraid to dare to show ourselves as we really are, just for fear of being judged, and no, it is not right, we must always feel free to be able to show ourselves as we are and people will have two alternatives: Accept us or leave, and definitely if they choose to leave it is the best for you.

Surround yourself with people who make you feel good, who do not judge you, and who contribute to your life.
